name: Yulia Kogay
bonch: The Bonch-Bruevich Saint-Petersburg State University of Telecommunications
faculty: Faculty of Infocommunication Networks and Systems
pm-text:
Managing large-scale B2B projects
Gathering requirements directly from clients in different countries (including Africancountries, such as Nigeria, and stakeholders in Netherlands)
Supporting project team, time and budget tracking, reports generating
qa-text:
Manual testing of cryptocurrency exchange platform as web, Android and iOS applications using Jira as a defect tracking tool
Manual testing of REST API using Postman
Automating E2E tests for exchange platform using Selenium, pytest and BDD framework Behave
Automating integration tests for P2P exchange API
